title: F (2006) (nsl.com)
first_paragraph:
F is a pure functional concatenative 
language originally designed as an extension of False. F contains the list-operations of K3 and the dip combinator 
of Joy. Floating-point and symbolic datatypes are supported. One-time assignment
is enforced in syntax. A theory of function-valence and -charge is outlined. F also contains a general continuation
primitive $, and the pattern sublanguage of XY.  G is a variant of F in which the K3 adverbs are implemented as primitives.

title: Vannevar Bush Engineered the 20th Century (ieee.org)
first_paragraph: His fingerprints were on the Manhattan Project, the World Wide Web, and more

title: Agilent 2000a / 3000a Oscilloscope NAND Recovery (salvagedcircuitry.com)
first_paragraph: I ran across an oscilloscope in need of love and attention on the Internet's favorite online auction site. After some back and forth from the seller, I found out that the scope didn't boot, one of the tell tale problems of the Agilent 2000a / 3000a / 4000a X-series oscilloscope series. The no boot condition can be caused by one of three things: a failed power supply, the mischievous NAND corruption error, or both. The seller took my lowball offer of $220 and just like that I had another project in my life.
